TEXT.TITLE: SUPERMARKETS GENERAL <SGC> FEBRUARY SALES RISE
TEXT.BODY: Supermarkets General Corp reported sales of 424.8 mln dlrs for the four-week period ended Feb 28, 1987, A 7.2 pct increase over sales of 396.4 mln dlrs for the comparable period last year. Reuter
